Texts.Chs: 或许你最后将会发现这些材料其他的获取途径，不过现在学习到的这种方式我想对于你来说应该是最佳的选择。记得，请多多尝试各种实验。
Texts.Eng: You'll eventually find other sources for these useful materials, but for now this is the best method you have access to. Experimentation will get you far!

Texts.Chs: 你已经收集到了一些^orange;水^reset;！如果你想要收集一些^green;氢气，氧气和盐(氯化钠)^reset;的话，收集一些水，然后将它们放入任何^green;手磨机或物质萃取器^reset;，以制造5份^orange;氢气^reset;！
Texts.Eng: You've gathered ^orange;Water^reset;! If you want to gather ^green;Hydrogen,Oxygen and Salt^reset;, collect some ^orange;Water^reset; and then use any ^green;hand mill or extractor^reset; to create 5 ^orange;Hydrogen^reset;!
